name: Life in a Hole
description:
This game was created for the Brackeys Game Jam 2020.1.

Life in a  Hole  is a simple autogenerate dungeon top down shooter .

You control a little seed just drop on the ground that is fighting his way out to reach the surfaces.

Controls:

W-A-S-D -> Move

Mouse Left Click  -> Fire

This was my first experiment with this type of games :) i know it's not perfect or even finish but any feedback is more then welcome!

Thank you!
